_header: Now of women this I say for me
_description: William Dunbar, ‘In prais of wemen’ — 34 lines in couplets

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Of women now þis I say for meoff eirthlie thingis nane may
                    bettir be…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…All women sould of ws haue honoringSeruice and luif abuif all
                    vþer thing
CamMagPep2553.Attributed Title: quod Dumbar in prays of women (p. 295)
